<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1944]]''' - While writing on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] sees a new character arrive on the scene. He later [[Letter 66
May}}: comments]]: "''(I am sure I did not invent him, I did not even want him, though I like him, but there he came walking into the woods of [[Ithilien]]): [[Faramir]], brother of [[Boromir]]''".
